markdown.markdown: Researcher / lecturer at the Chemnitz University of Technology. {{< fa solid graduation-cap size=lg >}} **Chemnitz University of Technology** - Germany 2017 $\rightarrow$ Habilitation in Computer Science. {{< fa solid graduation-cap size=lg >}} **Université Henri Poincaré Nancy-I** - France 2006 $\rightarrow$ PhD in Computer Science. {{< fa solid graduation-cap size=lg >}} **École Supérieure d'Électricité (Supélec)** - France 2002 $\rightarrow$ Engineering degree in Signal Processing and Microelectronics. {{< fa solid graduation-cap size=lg >}} **Université Rennes-I** - France 2002 $\rightarrow$ Master of Science in Microelectronics. ## Experience {{< fa solid person-chalkboard size=lg >}} **Chemnitz University of Technology** - Germany 2011 - now $\rightarrow$ Researcher / lecturer in the faculty of Computer science. * Research: * Computational neuroscience: basal ganglia, dopamine, hippocampus. * Neuroinformatics: neurosimulator [ANNarchy](https://github.com/ANNarchy/ANNarchy) * Machine learning, reinforcement learning. * Teaching: * Neurocomputing / Machine Learning * Deep Reinforcement Learning * Computer Vision * Introduction to AI. * Erasmus+ departmental coordinator. {{< fa solid microscope size=lg >}} **WWU University of Münster** - Germany 2006 - 2011 $\rightarrow$ Postdoc in the Institute of Psychology, lab of Markus [Lappe](https://www.uni-muenster.de/PsyIFP/AELappe), supervisor Fred Hamker. * Research: * Computational neuroscience: basal ganglia. {{< fa solid school size=lg >}} **Inria Lorraine** - France 2002 - 2006 $\rightarrow$ PhD student in the Cortex team (LORIA Nancy), supervisors Frédéric Alexandre and Nicolas Rougier. * Research: * Computational neuroscience: basal ganglia, visual attention. * Robotics. * Teaching (at the University of Nancy-I): * Computer architecture, Java, AI.
